item.title: Simple Cloud Password Manager
item.description: Simple Cloud Password Manager This simple password manager stores your data in your Dropbox cloud storage. IT DOES NOT HACK FACEBOOK, WHATSAPP, INSTAGRAM OR ANY OTHER SOCIAL NETWORK! All fields are visible on your screen and can be found easily by a quick text filter! To enable automatic data backups, please sign into Dropbox on app startup. Database restore feature will be available only if a mismatch between local and backed up databases is detected.
